name: Pip and Tia: Fallout Equestria
description:
Set in a post apocalyptic Equestria, Celestia watches over the Wasteland with help of it's Heroine. The Lightbringer Little Pip, together they judge and protect the what remains of the world below. Based on the Story Fallout Equestria and my side story Pip and Tia

This is a simple RPG Maker game, probably could finish in an hour. Meant as test or future projects.
